Posts.Content: Hi Penny I'm also scared as I am having a mastectomy on my right breast beginning of June. The thoughts in my head are whirling round and round. Reason why it's beginning of June is because I'm going on holiday and to late to cancel. I will of known my diagnosis six weeks before I have my surgery. Each day is different angry, upset, why me ? Keep thinking positive, Strong and sending hugs to you xx
Posts.Title: scared and angry
